code:
%% Integrated Proposal - Policy View
graph TD
  %% Governance / Policy
  G0[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
  G1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
  G2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

  %% CLEAR Core
  subgraph CORE[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    direction LR
    KMS[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    MQ[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    WN[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    DB[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    MET[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    KMS-->MQ-->WN-->DB-->MET
  end

  %% Edge / Municipal
  subgraph EDGE[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    direction TB
    W1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    W2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
  end

  %% AI / Audit
  subgraph AI[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    A1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    A2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  end

  %% Flows
  G1-- "決済依頼（バーチャルデビット/トークン認証）" -->G2
  G2-- "Txイベント（When/Who/Whom/Coin/Value）" -->EDGE
  EDGE-- "Witnessログ送信（非同期）" -->CORE
  CORE-- "整合証跡（Merkle Root / 署名）" -->G0
  AI-- "AI結果の監査証跡付与" -->CORE
  G0-- "方針・KPI（E-MAD）" -->MET
